chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_560
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
ocin in women with previous Caesarean section or parity ≥5, unless approved by a specialist
• Continuous electronic fetal heart rate monitoring is recommended
• Aim for adequate uterine contractions (3–5 contractions in 10 minutes). Once adequate contractions achieved,
do not increase the oxytocin rate further.
• Once in the active phase of labour, stop oxytocin
• Most women will experience adequate contractions at a dose of 12 milliunits/minute.
• If tachsystole develops (>5 contractions in 10
